DOC.brief_summary: This open , non-comparative study evaluate effectiveness safety Restylane correction nasolabial fold 12 month initial treatment , evaluate safety repeat treatment nasolabial fold 12 month initial treatment .
DOC.brief_title: A Post Market Evaluation After Treatment Nasolabial Folds
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria 18 year old Intent undergo correction nasolabial fold WRSR 34 Signed inform consent Markedly indurate defect significant midface volume loss prominent commissure . Active skin disease , inflammation related condition , infection , psoriasis herpes zoster near area treat . Subjects know hypersensitivity ingredient study product anaesthesia use study . Concomitant anticoagulant therapy therapy inhibitor platelet aggregation , ( e.g . nonsteriodal antiinflammatory drug , acetylsalicylic acid , Omega 3 Vitamin E ) within 2 week prior treatment , history bleeding disorder . Concomitant treatment chemotherapy , immunosuppressive agent , immunomodulatory therapy ( e.g . monoclonal antibody ) , systemic topical ( facial ) corticosteroid . ( Inhaled corticoid allow ) . Cancerous precancerous lesion treatment area . Subjects perform aesthetic facial surgery . Tissue augment therapy nonpermanent filler neurotoxin low orbital rim last 12 month . Facial laser treatment chemical peel low orbital rim last 6 month . Permanent implant filler , include fatinjections , place area treat . Women pregnant breast feed plan become pregnant study period . Participation clinical study within 30 day prior inclusion . Any medical condition opinion investigator would make subject unsuitable inclusion ( e.g . chronic , relapse hereditary disease may affect general condition may require frequent medical treatment , psychiatric disorder subject likely comply study procedure avoid facial cosmetic treatment low orbital rim ) . Subjects study site staff study , close relative ( defined parent , sibling , child spouse ) study site staff , well subject employ sponsor company , close relative employee sponsor company .
